div.p: AND HOW THEY LED US HERE.

p.span: A GATEWAY TO YOUR OWN PAST,

div.p: I WON'T LET YOU GET ME!
I WON'T LET YOU GET ME!

p.span: SPOCK AND I WILL GO BACK

div.p: A LIE IS A VERY POOR WAY
THAT MAKES YOU A BAD RISK,
MAN IS GOING TO BE ABLE TO
YOU KNOW AS WELL AS I DO
IN THE CITY A WEEK NOW
I HAVE A FRIEND THAT TALKS
MY YOUNG MAN IS TAKING ME
